name: Friend Request
description:
Friend Request

This is a short retro-inspired narrative arcade adventure, made in about a week for #GoGodotJam. I only picked up Godot for the first time a couple of weeks before working on this.

Little CPU just wants to make some friends and needs your help! Complete some arcade-style minigames to grow CPU's friendship group by totally legitimate means.

Controls

Just use the spacebar for everything!

Credits

Created by James Frost
ZX Eurostile and Computer pixel fonts by DamienG
Title screen music: HappyNES by Shane Ivers - https://www.silvermansound.com
